Class FileSystemUtil

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for the file system.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

    • Method Detail

      • checkOperation

        public static boolean checkOperation(@Nullable FileSystemDAO fsp,
                                     @Nullable net.proteusframework.users.capability.CapabilityDAO cp,
                                     @Nullable net.proteusframework.users.model.Principal user,
                                     FileSystemEntity fse,
                                     FileSystemEntityCapabilityOperation operation)
        Check the file operation against the specified file.
        Parameters:
        fsp - optional file system processor.
        cp - optional capability processor.
        user - optional user. Defaults to current principal if not specified.
        fse - the file system entity.
        operation - the operation to check.
        Returns:
        true if the user can execute the operation specified.

      • checkOperationForCurrentPrincipal

        public static boolean checkOperationForCurrentPrincipal(FileSystemEntity fse,
                                                        FileSystemEntityCapabilityOperation operation)
        Check the file operation against the specified file for the current user.
        Parameters:
        fse - the file system entity.
        operation - the operation.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • checkOperationForGroup

        public static boolean checkOperationForGroup(FileSystemDAO fsp,
                                             net.proteusframework.users.capability.CapabilityDAO cp,
                                             net.proteusframework.users.model.PrincipalGroup group,
                                             FileSystemEntity fse,
                                             FileSystemEntityCapabilityOperation operation)
        Check the file operation against the specified file.
        Parameters:
        fsp - optional file system processor.
        cp - optional capability processor.
        group - optional user. Defaults to current principal if not specified.
        fse - the file system entity.
        operation - the operation to check.
        Returns:
        true if the user can execute the operation specified.

      • convertFromDelimitedPath

        public java.util.List<FileSystemEntity> convertFromDelimitedPath(DirectoryEntity root,
                                                                 java.lang.String path,
                                                                 java.lang.String deliminator)
                                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Convert delimited path to a collection of FileSystemEntities.
        Parameters:
        path - the path
        root - the root.
        deliminator - the deliminator.
        Returns:
        a collection of narrowed FileSystemEntities.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error accessing the filesystem.

      • convertFromDelimitedPath

        public java.util.List<FileSystemEntity> convertFromDelimitedPath(DirectoryEntity root,
                                                                 java.lang.String path,
                                                                 java.lang.String deliminator,
                                                                 boolean throwExceptionOnInvalidPath)
                                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Convert delimited path to a collection of FileSystemEntities.
        Parameters:
        path - the path
        root - the root.
        deliminator - the deliminator.
        throwExceptionOnInvalidPath - throw an IOException on invalid path.
        Returns:
        a collection of narrowed FileSystemEntities. If throwExceptionOnInvalidPath if false, the collection may be empty to indicate that the path is not valid.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error accessing the filesystem.

      • convertToDelimitedPath

        public java.lang.String convertToDelimitedPath(java.util.Collection<FileSystemEntity> path,
                                               java.lang.String deliminator)
        Convert path to a delimited path.
        Parameters:
        path - the path.
        deliminator - the deliminator.
        Returns:
        the delimited path.

                                               java.lang.String deliminator)
        Convert path to a delimited path.
        Parameters:
        fse - the file system entity.
        deliminator - the deliminator.
        Returns:

      • getFiles

        public static java.util.List<FileEntity> getFiles(java.util.Collection<DirectoryEntity> subdirs,
                                                  FileSystemEntityFilter filter)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Get files on that match the criteria. This function traverses all sub directories.
        Parameters:
        subdirs - the subdirectories to check.
        filter - the filter to use.
        Returns:
        the files (attached and narrowed).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs.

      • getInstance

        public static FileSystemUtil getInstance()
        Get an instance.
        Returns:
        FileSystemUtil.

      • getLastElementFromDelimitedPath

        public @Nullable FileSystemEntity getLastElementFromDelimitedPath(DirectoryEntity root,
                                                                  java.lang.String path,
                                                                  java.lang.String deliminator)
        Get the last element in the path.

        This is intended to be more efficient than convertFromDelimitedPath(DirectoryEntity, String, String) in situations where only the last element is needed and the path is fully qualified / relative to the root.

        Parameters:
        root - the filesystem root.
        path - the path. The path should be a subpath of the specified root. It can include the root directory name or it can be absent in the path.
        deliminator - the deliminator.
        Returns:
        the last element narrowed or null if not found.

      • getLastElementFromDelimitedPath

        public @Nullable FileSystemEntity getLastElementFromDelimitedPath(DirectoryEntity root,
                                                                  java.lang.String path,
                                                                  java.lang.String deliminator,
                                                                  boolean decodePathComponents)
        Get the last element in the path.

        This is intended to be more efficient than convertFromDelimitedPath(DirectoryEntity, String, String) in situations where only the last element is needed and the path is fully qualified / relative to the root.

        Parameters:
        root - the filesystem root.
        path - the path. The path should be a subpath of the specified root. It can include the root directory name or it can be absent in the path.
        deliminator - the deliminator.
        decodePathComponents - option to decode path components.
        Returns:
        the last element narrowed or null if not found.

      • getPath

        public java.util.LinkedList<FileSystemEntity> getPath(FileSystemEntity fse)
        Get the path of entities to the file system entity.
        Parameters:
        fse - the file system entity.
        Returns:
        LinkedList.

                                                                @Nullable FileSystemEntityFilter filter)
        Get the sub directories.
        Parameters:
        start - starting point.
        filter - Optional filter.
        Returns:
        the list of sub directories.
